attributes.action: NO MORE ALLOWANCES FOR MPS NO MORE FREE MONEY
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
why should mps get extra money they get very well paid to much if you ask me have you sen the size of there houses ,we are maintaing bloody cheek a normal working  person has a morgage and when he goes to work and earn the money the morgage his dinners and anything else he want to buy comes out of his earnings.i thought we had got rid of highway robbers dick turpin took from the rich to give to the poor,the mps are doing it the other way steeling from the poor to give to themselves .no more allowances for mps they earn enough .why should they have second homes one is enough for any one let them stop in a bed and breakfast 2star would be good enough .
when my husband worked away from home he had to live in a caravan and couldnt claim for anything in his tax return .

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
